events.name: QualityCheckInitiated
events.description: Triggering a new quality check process for inventory.

events.name: QualityCheckCompleted
events.description: Indicating that the quality check for a batch has been finished.

events.name: QualityIssueReported
events.description: Capturing issues arising from quality checks.

events.name: QualityIssueResolved
events.description: Actions taken to rectify reported quality issues.

commands.name: InitiateQualityCheck
commands.description: Triggering a new quality check process for inventory.

commands.name: CompleteQualityCheck
commands.description: Indicating that the quality check for a batch has been finished.

commands.name: ReportQualityIssue
commands.description: Capturing issues arising from quality checks.

commands.name: ResolveQualityIssue
commands.description: Actions taken to rectify reported quality issues.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with inventory systems to provide real-time updates on quality status.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Collaborate with suppliers for quality assurance feedback.

integrationPoints.name: Logistics
integrationPoints.description: Ensure that logistics are informed about any quality issues impacting delivery.

integrationPoints.name: QualityReporting
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with reporting tools for better visibility of quality metrics.
